title: Isotope & Gary Boyle - Live At The BBC (1973-77; 2004) [WV]
description:
Isotope & Gary Boyle - Live At The BBC (1973-77; 2004)

UK -  Jazz-Rock, Fusion

Tracklist:

Isotope Radio 1 'In Concert' 12.10.73
01. Upward Curve (5:05)
02. Do The Business (5:58)
03. Retracing My Steps (5:23)
04. Honky Donkey (7:23)

Isotope Old Grey Whistle Test 26.3.74
05. Bite On This (2:13)
06. Upward Curve (4:53)

Gary Boyle Peel Session 22.8.77
07. The Dancer (6:36)
08. Cowshed Shuffle (6:19)
09. Almond Burfi (4:14)

Personnel:

*Jeff Clyne - Bass

*Brian Miller - Keyboards
*Nigel Morris - Drums
